Text.Page:
The lightless mercenaries received more supplies yesterday.

We can't pinpoint the supplier, but if they continue to get support as easily and frequently as this, it's definitely bad news for us.

Are you up for a raid, ? Go to the mercenary camp in the basin to the north and steal those supplies.

Thanks! This should keep things in our favor a little longer.

Khasib was asking about you while you were gone. I think he might be starting to figure out what I mean by "not my type." If you know what I mean...
The supplies are in the mercenary camp in the basin north of here. Well, did you get them?
